titleStmt.title: Rich: Nugents Cynthia Containing direfull sonnets, madrigalls, and passionate intercourses, describing his repudiate affections expressed in loues owne language.
Cynthia
titleStmt.author: Nugent, Richard, fl. 1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[urfoot] for Henrie Tomes, and are to be sould at his shop by Graies Inne new gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
